# getChannelIndex | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

-  getChannelIndex 

Instance Method# getChannelIndex

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
IOReturn getChannelIndex(uint64_t channel_id, int * channel_index);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/ioreporter_ivars/getchannelindex#parameters)

`channel_id`
- ID of the channel

`channel_index`
- pointer to the returned element_index

## [Return Value](/documentation/driverkit/ioreporter_ivars/getchannelindex#return-value)

Appropriate IOReturn code

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/ioreporter_ivars/getchannelindex#discussion)

Returns the index of a channel from internal data structures

For efficiently and thread-safely reading channels

Locking: Caller must ensure that the reporter (data) lock is held.
